name: Loopriz
tag_list: advertising, ads, business, company, directory, free, listing, loopriz, search, connection
overview:
Loopriz (TM) is a business platform, which connects all businesses around the world.

It has been created by a student in mid July 2009 as an experiment for businesses around the world, may it be a retailer, an NGO, Corporation etc. to get engaged in the world of information. The idea is for small entrepreneurs and rising businesses to gain faster connections and partners via this platform thus avoiding high advertisement costs.

*You can add your company and it can be seen by anyone in the world with one click of a search.

*Search via - region - keywords - company type - name - products/services

*Be able to give consumers all desired contacts of companies around the world.

Create your Business Card Online and share it. Easier to build up connections and find new business partners.

  • advertise your company / business for free
  • find companies around the world
  • new features coming soon!
